duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage all facets of the regional business operations, including sales, marketing, and operations.
Develop and execute strategies to grow existing regions and launch new regions from scratch.
Analyze market trends, consumer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Lead special projects to improve company operations and strategies, focusing on marketing, production, operations, product development, and other areas.
Mentor and guide teams, pitch learnings, and progress to C-level leadership, including the founders, at the end of each rotation.
Manage a small team in the region and reduce lead time of current deployment process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
